news.title: New LPI tutorials & Gentoo Linux CDs

body.p: Before I get to the tutorials, a quick note: Edmund's Enterprises is now selling Gentoo Linux 1.1a CDs for only $0.99 USD + $1.99 shipping. Many thanks to Edmund's Enterprises for this valuable (and super-inexpensive) service!

Now, for the tutorial info: IBM developerWorks is now featuring parts 1 through 4 of my LPI-102 certification tutorials. This set of tutorials will help to teach you the Linux system administration skills that you need to know in order to pass the Linux Professional Institute's LPI-102 certification test (there is also another series of four tutorials focused on skills needed for the LPI-101 test.) Here's a link to part 4 of the first LPI-102 tutorial which also contains links to the others. These tutorials were written by me (Daniel Robbins), Chris Houser and Aron Griffis and are a great resource for those wanting to beef up their Linux system administration skills. The LPI-102 tutorial series covers compiling applications for sources, Debian and Red Hat package management, kernel configuration and compilation, Linux hardware support, Linux networking, ssh, NFS and more.
